main_definition: An hour is a unit of time equal to 60 minutes, representing a period of one twelfth of a day.

meanings_and_examples.example: I have an appointment at 3 o'clock in the afternoon.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A unit of time measurement used globally for scheduling and organizing activities
meanings_and_examples.example: The meeting is scheduled to start in one hour, so please be on time.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used metaphorically or idiomatically to indicate a short period of time
meanings_and_examples.example: It took me just an hour to finish my homework.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Represents urgency and emphasizes the importance of something needing immediate attention
meanings_and_examples.example: I need your help, please. It's a matter of life or death - it takes only one hour.
